document.full_text: sprint nextel  has asked west virginia's state regulators to review at&t inc's  proposed $39 billion purchase of t-mobile usa and expects to file similar requests in other states.
document.title: sprint eyes state reviews of at&t/t-mobile usa
lines_and_colors: sprint nextel  has asked west virginia's state regulators to review at&t inc's  proposed $39 billion purchase of t-mobile usa and expects to file similar requests in other states.
